Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good news, <MYNAME>! A new resident has
moved into town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've brought him here to introduce him
to you. You can come inside now!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>You're <MYNAME>, are you? From the look of
you, you've got an abundance of
energy... if not intelligence!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Ah, sorry if I gave offense. I tend to
speak my mind.
<PAGE>
<NAME_UNKOWN>A bad habit of mine. I'm going to be
living here, so I came to say hello.
<PAGE>
<NAME_UNKOWN>My name is Klaus. As you can probably
tell, I'm a <BLUE>doctor</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>I'll look after you if you get sick, but
try to take care of it yourself if you
can!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone in town will be very grateful
for Klaus moving in.
<PAGE>
It means no more trips to other towns in
order to see a doctor.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all we wanted to say, anyway.
Sorry for coming by so early in the
morning. Keep up the good work!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hope I won't be seeing you too soon.

A new person has come to the town! He
seems a little strange but... let's
hope we become good friends!
